columns.name: alias_name
columns.description: String that contains the alias. This value begins with alias/.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: String that contains the key ARN.

columns.name: target_key_id
columns.description: String that contains the key identifier of the KMS key associated with the alias.

columns.name: creation_date
columns.description: Date and time that the alias was most recently created in the account and Region.

columns.name: last_updated_date
columns.description: Date and time that the alias was most recently associated with a KMS key in the account and Region.
